fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render

Class SyncRenderingManager

  • Object
    • SyncRenderingManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderingManager

    public class SyncRenderingManager
extends Object
implements RenderingManager
    A rendering manager responsible for rendering layers in a LayerViewPanel.
    Author:
    Julien Perret
